name: Cream Cheese Sheet Cake
ingredients: 1 c plus 2 t butter or margarine, softened 6 eggs
2 pkgs (3 oz each) cream cheese, softened ¾ tsp vanilla extract
steps: in a mixing bowl, cream butter, cream cheese and sugar. add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Beat in vanilla. Add flour; mix well. Pour into a greased 15-­‐in x 10 in x 1 in baking pan. Bake at 325 for 30-­‐35
minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. cool completely.
For frosting, combine sugar and milk in a saucepan; bring to a boil over medium heat. Cover and cook for 3
minutes (do not stir). Stir in butter and chocolate chips until melted. cool slightly. stir; spread over cake.
